ctx: intros x1 x2 y1 y2 H1 H2.

original: intros x1 x2 y1 y2 H1 H2. split. - intros H3. apply prodp_mono. + apply iff_elim_left with (x1 <--> x2). apply H1. + apply iff_elim_left with (y1 <--> y2). apply H2. + apply iff_intro. * apply H1. * apply H2. - intros H3. apply prodp_mono. + apply iff_elim_right with (x1 <--> x2). apply H1. + apply iff_elim_right with (y1 <--> y2). apply H2. + apply iff_intro. * apply H1. * apply H2.
